data.name: Beer Factory
data.detailed_description:
Beer Factory is a business simulation and management game. Take the challenge, manage your own beer factory, employees, production lines, import and export of the merchandise.

Logistics to manage


To produce, you usually need a production line, resources to refine, storage and transportation. In Beer Factory, the goal being to produce beer, you will need to import and store the raw materials, refine, brew in tanks, store the beer, bottle it and finally send it to the client.

Recruit and manage your employees


When you want to develop your business, there is nothing better than hiring employees to help you with your tasks. The employees in your factory can help you with most tasks and it is up to you to tell them what to do, but be sure to monitor them.

A realistic economy


Every action has a cost and it's up to you to manage your finances well. From recruitment to transportation to taxes, the whole finance system in Beer Factory has been designed to be as close to reality as possible.

Customize and upgrade your factory


In order to produce beer you need all kinds of machines. Once you have invested in new machines, you will be able to exploit them, improve them to exploit their maximum potential and produce even more! You will also be able to expand your factory to grow your business on larger scales!
